Class PasswordChangeActivity

java.lang.Object

                  com.seatunity.boardingpass.PasswordChangeActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, CallBackApiCall
public class PasswordChangeActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements CallBackApiCall

This activity provides a simple UI & an API calling methodology to change the password of the user.
